response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic decision-making. Should you choose to accept, you'll be securing not just a product, but a strategic advantage in your industry. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
